summary: The diff implements the majority of requirements: new backend inquiry model extensions (REQ-18, REQ-24), new pages for Custom Packages, Railway Bookings, Flight Bookings, and Terms & Conditions (REQ-17, REQ-21, REQ-22, REQ-23), updated Car Rentals page with per-km pricing (REQ-19), hero image replacement (REQ-20), updated homepage services section (REQ-25), updated header and footer navigation. However, several specific acceptance criteria have gaps, particularly around the admin inquiries page displaying the new fields for all new inquiry categories.

missing_requirements.requirement: The admin inquiries page displays custom package inquiries with all submitted fields visible.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff does not show any modifications to AdminInquiriesPage to display custom package fields (destinationType, destination, numberOfTravelers, durationDays, preferredDates). The admin page file is not in the modified files list.

missing_requirements.requirement: Admin inquiries list displays distance and estimated fare for car rental bookings.
missing_requirements.reason: AdminInquiriesPage is not listed as a modified file, so there is no evidence that the admin view was updated to show estimatedDistance and estimatedFare for car rental inquiries.

missing_requirements.requirement: The Car Rentals booking form includes a checkbox that must be checked before submission for all rentals.
missing_requirements.reason: In CarRentalsPage.tsx, the termsAccepted check is only enforced when driverRequired is false. The AC states the checkbox must be present and checked before submission, but the implementation only blocks self-drive rentals without T&C acceptance.

missing_requirements.requirement: Admin inquiries list shows railway booking inquiries with all fields.
missing_requirements.reason: AdminInquiriesPage is not listed as a modified file; no evidence of railway booking fields being displayed in the admin view.

missing_requirements.requirement: Admin inquiries list shows flight booking inquiries with all fields.
missing_requirements.reason: AdminInquiriesPage is not listed as a modified file; no evidence of flight booking fields being displayed in the admin view.

missing_requirements.requirement: The new image file hero-premium-travel.dim_1600x800.png must be present as a static asset in frontend/public/assets/generated.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff lists 5 added files but does not include the actual image binary hero-premium-travel.dim_1600x800.png. Only .tsx and .mo files are listed as added. The image is referenced in code but there is no evidence the asset file was added.

hallucinated_features.description: A dedicated migration module (backend/migration.mo) was created to handle schema migration from old to new inquiry types.
hallucinated_features.reason: The build request did not explicitly request a separate migration module. It only required extending the existing Motoko inquiry model. While useful for upgrades, this was not listed as a requested deliverable.
